body.para: I installed on my Plone 3 test instance the just released EasyCommenting 0.5 & EasyRating 2.5 products by Kai Diefenbach.
EasyRating works perfectly while EasyCommenting doesn't show any new interface on the standard ATCTs. Am I missing something?

I followed the install instructions and tried to make a fresh new plone installation too: no error is generated and the preferences are set, so I guess everything is going right. I also added the Pending Comments portlet but, obviously, never appears.
If I active the standard Plone discussion machinery (via zmi>portal_types) I can see only the usual reply form.
Anyway, I'd like to finally have a modern comment machinery on Plone, so I'm asking some help to the author.
My environment is composed by Python 2.4.4 | Zope 2.10.4 | Plone 3.0.1
